hangle: 원작이랑 또 흐름이 달라진 거 아냐?!
first_translate: didn’t this scene play out differently in the original story?!
it looks like his majesty has arrived.

hangle: 여기 있는 모두가 기쁜 소식을 들었으리라 믿는다.
first_translate: I believe you’ve all heard the good news by now.
the glorious bloodline of our imperial family...

hangle: 북방에서 지대한 공을 세웠다는 것을 말이지.

first_translate: now she remembers him as her own child.

hangle: 이 자리에서 네가 세운 공적을 모두에게 보여다오.
first_translate: show everyone what you have accomplished.
this is the heart of the dragon I killed.
I present it to you, my king.
ooh! look how powerful the bloodline of our empire is!

hangle: 아무리 강한 마물이라도 소용이 없다는 걸 보여주는구나.
first_translate: even the strongest monsters are no match for us!
that really is a dragon's heart...
...the greatness of our kingdom and its royal family!

hangle: 그러니 역사에 남을 공을 세운 짐의 아들에게,
first_translate: to commemorate such a historic achievement,
I shall restore my son back to his rightful place.

hangle: 이 자리에서 시그렌을 정식 황자로 책봉하겠다!
first_translate: in front of these witnesses, I hereby declare siegren as one of my official princes!

hangle: 내심 싫은 사람도 많을 텐데, 사회생활 잘하는군.
first_translate: a lot of them must secretly despise him, but they’re doing well not to show it.

hangle: 표정 관리가 안 될 정도로 불만이 많은 모양이야.
first_translate: ...looks very displeased about this turn of events.
of course, if someone new becomes part of the royal family,
if everything goes according to plan,
he’ll become a villainous character who harasses the main characters.
throw that bastard into prison right away!!!
throw that bastard into prison right away!!!
throw that bastard into prison right away!!!
but I’m sure eunice will take care of him herself.
how did you manage to slay a dragon?
when did you meet his highness?
and who is the young woman beside him?
I'll tell you during the meeting of the five families.

hangle: 개국 공신 가문 다섯이 모이는 회의에서만 밝힌다니.
first_translate: so only when those founding meritorious families gather together will we know more about her identity.
I can hear every single thing you say.

hangle: 아벨, 저 잠시 바람 좀 쐬고 올게요.
first_translate: abel, I need some fresh air.
I didn’t expect myself to receive so much attention too.

hangle: 다들 남의 일에 관심이 참 많다니까.
first_translate: people always seem to enjoy gossiping about others’ business.
stop playing hard to get already.
can you please call me miss priscilla...

hangle: 도도한 것도 좋지만 너무 뻣뻣하게 굴면 재미없다고.
first_translate: while being haughty may suit you, don’t make yourself sound too stiff.
that wasn’t nice of you to say.
isn’t that the crown prince and lady livia priscilla?

hangle: 내 맘에 들면 황태자비가 될 수도 있는데~
first_translate: if she catches his eye, maybe she’ll even become the future crown princess!

hangle: 황태자인 내 허락도 없이 멋대로 어디를 가?
first_translate: do you dare leave without permission from me, the crown prince?
after all the times I complimented on your beauty!

hangle: 아까 프리실라 공작님께서 영애를 급히 찾으셨어요.
first_translate: earlier, duke priscilla had been looking everywhere for you, my lady.

hangle: 저도 공작님을 도와 같이 영애를 찾고 있던 참이었답니다.
first_translate: I was helping him search for you.
I didn’t notice you were also here, your highness!
greetings, little sun of the empire.

hangle: 아무리 황태자라도 헤일론 가문을 건들긴 쉽지 않지.
first_translate: not even the crown prince would want to mess around with house haylorne.

hangle: 그러고 보니, 아버지가 제게 할 말이 있다고 하셨죠.
first_translate: by the way, you said earlier that you wanted to talk to me about something.

hangle: 백 번이고 천 번이고 찾으러 올게요!
first_translate: I'd come find you again and again!
with that excuse, allow me to bid farewell, your highness.

hangle: 전하께서 따라올지도 모르니까, 조금만 더 팔짱 끼고 걸어요.
first_translate: let’s walk arm-in-arm a bit longer since his highness might follow us.
I picked this up earlier while nobody noticed.

hangle: 황태자는 정말 곤란했지만 예상 밖의 인연을 얻었네.
first_translate: although the crown prince failed miserably today, he gained himself an unexpected ally.
the brutal magician of house haylorne.
